title: 11/26/2020 – Hour 1 – Thanksgiving football, Shawne Merriman
itunes:title: 11/26/2020 – Hour 1 – Thanksgiving football, Shawne Merriman
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Rob Parker fill in for Dan Patrick and preview the Thanksgiving Day slate of football games! They talk about the NFL’s decision to postpone the Ravens / Steelers game amid positive COVID-19 tests and preview the rest of Week 12 with former Pro Bowl linebacker Shawne Merriman. Plus, should LaMelo Ball be concerned that the was drafted by Michael Jordan? 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
